arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ بَيِّضْ وَجْهِىْ يَوْمَ تَسْوَدُّ الْوُجُوْهُ
وَلَا تُسَوِّدْ وَجْهِىْ يَوْمَ تَبْيَضُّ الْوُجُوْهُ
translation: O Lord! Make my face bright on the Day when the faces will turn dark.
Do not darken my face on the Day when the faces are bright.
transliteration: allāhumma bayyiḍ wajhī yawma taswaddul wujūh
walā tusawwid wajhī yawma tabyaḍḍul wujūh
